name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-statusmessage
title: Teams Status ACE Example
shortDescription: This ACE demonstrates how to use the Presence Graph API endpoints (beta) to set and retrieve a presence status message for a user.
longDescription: This ACE demonstrates how to use the Presence Graph API endpoints (beta) to set and retrieve a presence status message for a user.
